title: STRtr-kit Evidence
description: Evidence to support pathogenicity of tandem repeat loci in human disease. Each entry describes evidence from a single publication or similar source. There will typically be multiple entries per locus, each describing evidence from different sources.
citation_format: In free text strings: 'Some text [@doi:12345; @pmid:12345]'. In regular lists: ['doi:12345', 'pmid:12345']

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier for the locus within STRchive in the form [disease_id]_[gene]. Additional characters may be added to the end of the ID to make it unique within STRchive, e.g. HFG_HOXA13-I, HFG_HOXA13-II.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: Citation for the source of the evidence

genetic_evidence.title: Genetic Evidence
genetic_evidence.description: One or more pieces of genetic evidence provided in the source

genetic_evidence_type.title: Genetic Evidence Type
genetic_evidence_type.description: The type(s) of genetic evidence provided in the source

enum_descriptions.allele_effect: Relationship between allele size and/or motif sequence and phenotype e.g. age of onset and/or severity

probands_count.title: Number of probands
probands_count.description: Number of probands with the pathogenic expansion reported in the source

points_genetic.title: Points (Genetic Evidence)
points_genetic.description: Points assigned to this locus based on the genetic evidence provided in the source, according to the STRtr-kit scoring system.

notes_genetic.title: Notes (Genetic Evidence)
notes_genetic.description: Additional notes about the genetic evidence provided in the source including point upgrades/downgrades
examples: Segregation analysis in 3 affected families with LOD score of 3.5

experimental_evidence.title: Experimental Evidence
experimental_evidence.description: One or more pieces of experimental evidence provided in the source

experimental_evidence_type.title: Experimental Evidence Type
experimental_evidence_type.description: The type(s) of experimental evidence provided in the source

enum_descriptions.altfunction_patient_cells: Functional Alteration in Patient Cells Model
enum_descriptions.altfunction_non_patient_cells: Functional Alteration in Non-patient Cells Model

points_experimental.title: Points (Experimental Evidence)
points_experimental.description: Points assigned to this locus based on the experimental evidence provided in the source, according to the STRtr-kit scoring system.

notes_experimental.title: Notes (Experimental Evidence)
notes_experimental.description: Additional notes about the experimental evidence provided in the source including point upgrades/downgrades
examples: Functional alteration demonstrated in patient-derived cell lines
